title: Most popular social media apps in the U.S. 2019 , by audience
summary: This is a bar chart representing Platform in the x axis and Million unique visitors in the y axis.
The maximum Million unique visitors 169.76 is found at Platform Facebook (main) and the minimum is found at WeChat where Platform is 1.48.
The difference of Million unique visitors between the highest and lowest Platform is 168.28.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Platform in the x axis and Million unique visitors in the y axis.
The Million unique visitors is appeared to be the highest at Platform Facebook (main) and lowest at Platform WeChat.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Platform in the x axis and Million unique visitors in the y axis.
The maximum Million unique visitors 169.76 is found at Platform Facebook (main) and the minimum is found at WeChat where Platform is 1.48.
The difference of Million unique visitors between the highest and lowest Platform is 168.28.
max_summary: This bar chart has 21 columns on the x axis representing Platform, and Million unique visitors in each Platform on the y axis.
The Million unique visitors is highest at Platform Facebook (main) and lowest at Platform WeChat.
Platform Instagram (main) has the second highest value for Million unique visitors.
The highest Platform Facebook (main) has 168.28 more Million unique visitors than the lowest Platform WeChat.
Million unique visitors at Platform Facebook (main) is 169.76 , second place is Instagram (main) at 121.23, and thirdly is Facebook Messenger at 106.4.
The Platform WeChat has 4.61 times less Million unique visitors than average.
